title: Electric Torch

nouns: A small portable battery-powered electric lamp
A flashlight is a hand-held portable electrically-powered light source, and is often called a torch in areas outside of North America.
A portable light source powered by electricity; a flashlight.
A power source for a portable device.

description:
An everyday flashlight (electric torch), as used when the power goes out, camping, or telling scary stories. Generally depicted at a 45° angle as a gray and black device with a switch, shown illuminated on many platforms.

Used for various content concerning and senses of light and lighting (e.g., spotlight).

Google’s flashlight was previously orange.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the flashlight emoji illuminates with a bright, warm beam emanating from its lens, casting a soft glow. Its polished metallic casing features realistic highlights and shadows, demonstrating Appleâ€™s commitment to detailed 3D rendering. This emoji on Apple devices symbolizes guidance, discovery, or the need for clarity in a dark situation.
